p: As no satellite images were available before 1990, a topographic map (1:50 000) produced by Ministério do Ultramar/Junta das Missões Geográficas e de Investigações do Ultramar in 1953 and an aerial photograph from 1976 (1:100 000) produced by the Institut National de 'l'Information Géographique et Forestière (IGN) were manually digitized on-screen to obtain more information on land cover types.
